pages.text: The heavy class loadout is the explosives expert class and the only class that has access to the C4 blocks. So you might want to consider having a heavy class teammate. Please note that the heavy class are the main class who will rely on protection from other classes in long distance combat.
The items it gives you are the following.$(br)$(li1)Pistol$(li1)Bazooka$(li1)16 C4 Blocks$(li1)Armor$(li1)24 Grenades$(li1)128 Ammo$(li1)The Reset Rod$(li1)The Tablet
